summary: Just a small change to the Perks to enhance the overall feel of your honeyed words.
descriptionHtml:
What does it do?

Change the perks of Persuation and Intimidation to be always successfull instead of giving a bonus.
NOTE: This doesn't work for every option because bethesda has inteagrated options which always fail, and have no "success" dialogue or script applied.

How to Install?

Use NMM for easy install or apply the esp to your data folder and check that it is loaded.

Enjoy!

Please let me know if you have any issues with my mod.
author: Baskiney
